name: Planets Evolve
description:
Hey, This is a Game made in Unity for the Space Jam.
You will start out in Space with the default planet (Earth).
After you finish the evolution and keep the civilization alive on the default planet you will start out with another Planet.

#SPOILER#
After the second Planet there will be a Bonus-...
#SPOILER#

Feel free to contact me if you find Bugs or Issue.

Discord: Glydrike#3112

#REMINDER#
This game is still in progress and will get updates in the future with more features!
#REMINDER#
